= Quick start, protobuf-javame =

1. [http://code.google.com/p/protobuf-javame/downloads/list]Download the latest version add the protobuf-javame.jar to your project.
2. Use the proto2javame.jar to generate the source code from your proto-file.
command: 'java -jar proto2javame.jar --java_out=<generated-source-folder> <path to your proto-file>
3. Use the generated builder object to read/write the populated object:
'generatedObject.writeTo(...)
'MyGeneratedObject generatedObject = MyGeneratedObject.parseFrom(...)
